00188 #define RKH_CREATE_HSM( sm_t, name, id, ppty, is, ia, hd )              \
00189                                                                         \
00190                 static sm_t s_##name = CHSM( id,ppty,name,is,ia,hd );   \
00191                 RKH_T * const name = ( RKH_T* )&s_##name

00213 #define RKH_CREATE_COMP_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,defchild,history )  \
00214                                                                         \
00215                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00216                                                                         \
00217                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00218                                 {                                       \
00219                                     mkbase(RKH_COMPOSITE,id,name),      \
00220                                     mkcomp(en,ex,parent,name,           \
00221                                                 defchild,history)       \
00222                                 }
00223

00251                                                                         \

00253                                                                         \

00284                                                                         \
00285                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \

00338 #define RKH_CREATE_DEEP_HISTORY_STATE( name,id,parent )                 \
00339                                                                         \
00340                                 static rkhrom RKHSREG_T *ram##name;     \
00341                                                                         \
00342                                 rkhrom RKHSHIST_T name =                \
00343                                 {                                       \
00344                                     mkbase(RKH_DHISTORY,id,name),       \
00345                                     parent,&ram##name                   \
00346                                 }
